sequoia.company_purpose: Start here: define your company in a single declarative sentence. This is harder than it looks. It's easy to get caught up listing features instead of communicating your mission.
sequoia.problem: Describe the pain of your customer. How is this addressed today and what are the shortcomings to current solutions.
sequoia.solution: Explain your eureka moment. Why is your value prop unique and compelling? Why will it endure? And where does it go from here?
sequoia.why_now: The best companies almost always have a clear why now? Nature hates a vacuumâ€”so why hasn't your solution been built before now?
sequoia.market_potential: Identify your customer and your market. Some of the best companies invent their own markets.
sequoia.competition: Who are your direct and indirect competitors. Show that you have a plan to win.
sequoia.business_model: How do you intend to thrive?
sequoia.team: Tell the story of your founders and key team members.
sequoia.financials: If you have any, please include.
sequoia.vision: If all goes well, what will you have built in five years?
